testsuite.test:
Only one local number
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did the SMS app open a new message * to 12345?

Only one global number
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did the SMS app open a new message * to +12345678?

Two local numbers
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did the SMS app open a new message * to 2 recipients (12345, 223344)?

Two global numbers
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did the SMS app open a new message * to 2 recipients (+12345678, +333444)?

Multiple local numbers
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did the SMS app open a new message * to 5 recipients (12345, 223344, 444555, 9090909, 88888)?

Multiple global numbers
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did the SMS app open a new message * to 4 recipients (+12345678, +333444, +222222, +9990999)?

One local and global number
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did the SMS app open a new message * to 2 recipients (12345, +555666)?

One global and local number
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did the SMS app open a new message * to 2 recipients (+555666, 12345)?

One local number body
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did the SMS app open a new message * to 12345 * with the content 'test content'?

One global number body
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did the SMS app open a new message * to +12345678 * with the content 'test content'?
